translation.en: BOTH: Come and play with us. Come and play.
translation.es: ¡Ven a jugar con nosotros!¡Ven a jugar!

translation.en: BOY 1: Not gonna get me! BOY 2: You wish!
REPORTER 1: This morning's quake is causing major problems for commuters.
translation.es: El terremoto de hoyestá creando problemas de tránsito.

translation.en: The 5.7-magnitude quake hit New York early this morning.
translation.es: El terremoto de 5.7 gradossacudió Nueva York esta mañana.

translation.en: Yet another in a series of quakes that has rattled both coasts.
translation.es: Otro en una serie de tembloresque han sacudido ambas costas.

translation.en: Tokyo was hit again. And with the Berlin quake last week--
translation.es: ¡Tokio sufrió otro terremoto! Y con elde Berlín de la semana pasada...

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Question is: What is causing all these earthquakes?
Christ, even ESPN's doing the quakes now.
translation.es: Hasta en el canal de deporteshablan de los temblores.

translation.en: Hey. My folks sent me over to see...
translation.es: Mis padres me mandaron a ver...

translation.en: -...if you guys are still alive. -We're fine, Timmy.
-See you later? LAURIE: Say hi to your mom for me.
Don't forget, you have Dr. Hotchkiss after school.
translation.es: Tienes cita con el Dr. Hotchkissesta tarde.

translation.en: We're wasting money on all those shrinks.
Come on, man, just give me my book.
-What's wrong, your meds stop working? TEACHER: Hey! Hey!
JAKE: Give me my book! -Get off me!
Hey. You need to go home and cool off.
translation.es: Vete a tu casa y cálmate.

translation.en: HOTCHKISS: You've been, uh, quite busy, Jake.
This big tower in the clouds you keep dreaming about...
translation.es: Esta torre en las nubescon la que sueñas...

translation.en: ...you say these earthquakes we've been having have something to do with it.
translation.es: ¿Dices que los terremotostienen algo que ver con ella?

translation.en: They happen because the Tower is under attack.
translation.es: Suceden porquealguien está atacando la Torre.

translation.en: You know when you can't differentiate...
-...between dreams and reality-- -It's not a dream.
translation.es: -...entre los sueños y la rea...-¡No es un sueño!

translation.en: I always see the same thing.
The Tower, the Man in Black, the creepy guys with the fake skins.
translation.es: La Torre, el Hombre de Negro,los tipos con piel falsa.

translation.en: What if the Tower were destroyed?
When you lost your father, your world fell apart.
translation.es: Cuando perdiste a tu padre,tu mundo se desmoronó.

translation.en: You have these visions of impending hell on Earth...
...Jake, you're describing the night your father died.
translation.es: Estás describiendo la nocheen que murió tu padre.
Se roban a niños como tú.

translation.en: The power of your mind, that's what they want.
translation.es: El poder de tu mente...Eso es lo que quieren.

translation.en: LON: --control, he's unstable. We need to take the offer.
-It's great treatment for no money. LAURIE: It's not about the money.
translation.es: -Es un buen tratamiento gratis.-No se trata solo del dinero.

translation.en: -...we can do for him now. LAURIE: Jesus, Lon!
Can you at least pretend like he's your own kid?
translation.es: ¿No puedes siquiera fingirque es tu hijo?

translation.en: I'm sorry, baby, we.... We didn't hear you come in.
translation.es: Perdón, mi vida, no te oímos entrar.

translation.en: What the hell happened in school today?
You promised me you're gonna stay out of trouble.
...the school's been approached by a clinic upstate.
Who are having a hard time.

translation.es: Hay una vacante este fin de semana.

translation.en: It's supposed to be a great place.
It's science-based: Brain scans, sleep patterns.
LAURIE: I think it could-- -Yeah, okay.
You think I'm crazy too, don't you?

translation.es: Mueren cinco en explosión de gasBombero muere rescatando residentes
Solo te pido que me ayudes.

translation.en: We need help. We both need help.
LAURIE: I love him so much...
...and I just can't stand to see him like this.
He was such a happy kid.
You have nothing to be afraid of, my friend.
translation.es: No tienes nada que temer, amigo.

translation.en: You want to know what's on the other side?
Not while the Tower still stands.
translation.es: No mientras la Torre siga de pie.
No mientras tú sigas de pie.

translation.en: Don't let him get into your head.
translation.es: Que no se te metan en la cabeza.

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not aim with my hand.
-He who aims with his hand-- -Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: -Aquel que apunta con la mano...-Ha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: BOTH [IN UNISON]: I aim with my eye.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que dispara con la manoha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: -I shoot with my mind. WALTER: Gunslingers.
BOTH [IN UNISON]: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que mata con su pistolaha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: It never works on you, does it, Roland?
translation.es: Nunca te afecta a ti,¿verdad, Roland?

translation.en: The power you have to resist my magics....
translation.es: El poder que tienespara resistir mis magias...
Hasta la próxima vez, viejo amigo.

translation.en: WOMAN: The Man in Black fled across the desert...
translation.es: El Hombre de Negro huyóa través del desierto...

translation.en: -Hey. -This guy, he's some kind of soldier.
And this house, look, it's got a U.S. mailbox.
translation.es: Y esta casa tiene un buzón de EE. UU.

translation.en: -I think it's in New York. MAN: Timmy, it's 7 a.m.
translation.es: -Creo que está en Nueva York.-Timmy, son las 7:00 a.m.

translation.en: Sorry, got to go. Talk to you later.
translation.es: Disculpa, me tengo que ir.Luego hablamos.

translation.en: The people from the clinic are here.
translation.es: Vino la gente de la clínica.

translation.en: I can't.... I can't go now.
You got to step up, Jake.
If you won't do it for yourself, then do it for your mom.
translation.es: Si no lo haces por ti,hazlo por tu mamá.

translation.en: LAURIE: It's in other boys? JILL: It's common in adolescent boys.
translation.es: Es muy común en los adolescentes.

translation.en: What exactly do they do at your clinic?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que hacen en su clínica?

translation.en: Jake, these guys have been working with the school for a long time.
translation.es: Esta gente lleva mucho tiempotrabajando con la escuela.

translation.en: No, that's okay, Laurie. We encourage questions.
He's just a healthy growing boy.
I can assure you that all our tests are done in a controlled...
translation.es: Te aseguro que todas nuestras pruebasen un ambiente...

translation.en: We have experience with cases like yours.
translation.es: Tenemos mucha experienciaen casos como el tuyo.

translation.en: Our approach is actually very gentle compared to standard treatments.
translation.es: Nuestro tratamiento es muy gentilcomparado con los más comunes.

translation.en: I understand your concerns, but you don't have to worry at all.
translation.es: Entiendo que tengas dudas,pero no te preocupes.

translation.en: Do you want your ripped jeans or your regular ones?
translation.es: ¿Quieres los jeans rotos o los normales?

translation.en: -What? -It's the skin people from my dream.
translation.es: -¿Qué?-Es la gente de la piel de mi sueño.

translation.en: -Honey, you need to stop this. -No, you have to listen to me.

translation.es: -No es su cara de verdad.-Por el amor de Dios.

translation.en: You actually hope I'm crazy, just so you can get me out of here.
translation.es: Esperas que esté locopara poder sacarme de aquí.

translation.en: Mom, you have to believe me.
-Lon, maybe this-- -Can't you see he's gotten worse?
translation.es: -Lon, quizá esto...-¿No ves que ha empeorado?

translation.en: You're gonna go with them right now.
translation.es: Vas a ir con ellos ahora mismo.

translation.en: Or, I swear to God, I will drag you down the stairs myself.
translation.es: O te juro que te arrastrarépor las escaleras.
Es un fin de semana, hijo.

translation.en: If you don't like it, then I'll come get you.
translation.es: Si no te gusta, iré por ti.

translation.en: -I love you, Mom. -I love you too.
I'm just gonna get my toothbrush.
translation.es: Voy a agarrar mi cepillo de dientes.

translation.en: -He's just getting his things. -He's trying to escape.
translation.es: -Está bien. Fue por sus cosas.-Se quiere escapar.

translation.en: TOBY: Come back here! JILL: Don't worry.
Toby will get him down safely.
translation.es: Toby lo bajará sin que se lastime.

translation.en: -Mom? You okay? LAURIE: Where are you?
You can't just run away like that, Jake.
Find yourself a face, Rat Boy.
Fine. Do we have any new leads?
PIMLI: These are all showing promise.
Our trackers are going out to them as we speak.
TIRANA: There's been a serious breach of--
One of the old portals on Keystone Earth.
translation.es: Un viejo portalen la Tierra Piedra Angular.

translation.en: Find me a portal close by.
translation.es: Búscame un portal cerca de aquí.

translation.en: Choose a pretty face and the world is your oyster.
translation.es: Si escoges una cara linda,el mundo está a tus pies.

translation.en: There are no Gunslingers. Not anymore.
-But I saw you. -Your dreams deceived you, boy.
translation.es: -Pero te vi.-Tus sueños te engañaron, niño.

translation.en: Told you what you want to hear.
translation.es: Te dijeron lo que querías oír.

translation.en: I came a long way to find you.
translation.es: Vine de muy lejos a buscarte.

translation.en: ROLAND: Have a nice trip back.
translation.es: Que tengas buen viaje de regreso.

translation.en: There was a battlefield, and you were fighting the Man in Black. And there--
translation.es: Había un campo de batalla, y estabaspeleando con el Hombre de Negro.

translation.en: -No, no, no. I don't know! -Where is he hiding?!
-Where is he hiding?! -I don't know, I swear!
translation.es: -¿Dónde se está escondiendo?-¡No sé! ¡Te lo juro!

translation.en: I just-- I just saw him in my dreams, like I saw you!
translation.es: ¡Lo vi en mis sueñoscomo te vi a ti!

translation.en: When did you first see this?
In all your visions, Walter is here?
translation.es: En todas tus visiones,¿Walter está aquí?

translation.en: There's a tribe beyond that forest. We'll go there.
translation.es: Hay una tribu más alláde ese bosque. Iremos allá.

translation.en: They have seers who will read your visions.

translation.es: Y cuando bajé por la resbaladilla...

translation.en: Then I got water up my nose, and I went down...
Walter Padick. To what do we owe this great honor?
translation.es: Walter Padick.¿A qué debemos este gran honor?

translation.en: Someone used a portal here, in your city...
translation.es: Alguien usó un portal, en tu ciudad...

translation.en: We'll find out who this trespasser is and where he went.
translation.es: Descubriremos quién es el intrusoy a dónde fue.

translation.en: So that's how he got through.
...but a truly powerful psychic could override it.
A boy with the Shine strong enough to kill a demon?
translation.es: ¿Un niño cuyo toquepuede matar a un demonio?

translation.en: Sayre, didn't two skins have trouble with a kid yesterday?
translation.es: Señor, dos pieles falsas tuvieronproblemas con un niño ayer, ¿no?

translation.en: Don't want to have to carry you for the rest of the way.
translation.es: No quiero cargarte el resto del camino.

translation.en: Don't run off in the woods. It's not safe.
translation.es: No vayas al bosque.No es seguro.

translation.en: But you were the one who ran off.
These ancient structures are from before the world moved on.
translation.es: Estas estructuras son de antesde que el mundo cambiara.

translation.en: No one knows what they are.
There was a field covered with bodies.
translation.es: Había un campo lleno de cadáveres.

translation.en: I lost my father that day.
translation.es: Ese día perdí a mi padre.

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you in person, sir.
translation.es: Es un honor conocerloen persona, señor.
¿En qué le podemos servir a él?

translation.en: Well, I hear you lost a kid.
translation.es: Oí que perdieron a un niño.

translation.en: It was as if the child knew what we were. We're doing everything we can--
translation.es: Fue como si supiera lo que éramos.Estamos haciendo todo lo posible...

translation.en: Calm down. Enjoy the show, folks.
You draw with a good hand.
I don't know what this is.
My father showed me a.... A map like this once.
translation.es: Me papá me enseñóun mapa parecido una vez.

translation.en: Inside the circle is your world and my world...
translation.es: Dentro del círculoestán tu mundo y mi mundo.

translation.en: The Dark Tower stands at the center of all things.
translation.es: La Torre Oscura está en el centrode todas las cosas.

translation.en: And it's stood there from the beginning of time.
translation.es: Ha estado ahídesde los inicios del tiempo.

translation.en: And it sends out powerful energy...

translation.es: Nos defiende de lo que hay fuera.
Afuera hay una oscuridad sin fin...

translation.en: ...full of demons trying to get to us.
Walter wants to tear down the Tower and let them in.
translation.es: Walter quiere destruir la Torrey dejarlos entrar.

translation.en: When the Tower falls, he'll rule...
But you're trying to stop him, aren't you?
I've seen them try to destroy it.
-If we could just get there-- -There is no "we," Jake.
All that matters to me is that I find...
translation.es: Lo único que me importaes encontrar...

translation.en: They're just like the quakes we get back home.
translation.es: Son como los terremotosque tenemos en casa.

translation.en: Yeah, what happens in one world...
translation.es: Sí, lo que pasa en un mundo...

translation.en: Everyone who walks with you dies.
translation.es: Todos los que caminan contigose mueren.

translation.en: It's good to see you, man. You got tall.
That was just a small tear.
They happen after every attack on the Tower.
translation.es: Suceden después de cada ataquea la Torre.

translation.en: Those things, they're what's coming if the Tower falls, aren't they?
translation.es: Esas cosas vendránsi cae la Torre, ¿verdad?

translation.en: But if we find that place where they're keeping the kids, we could--
translation.es: Pero si encontramos el lugardonde tienen a los niños...
Pero si encontramos el lugardonde tienen a los niños... ¿Qué?

translation.en: That was brave, going for the gun.
LON: They're gonna find him, Laurie.
We filled out every form. They have his picture.
translation.es: Llenamos todas las formas,tienen su foto.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind me making myself at home.
translation.es: Ojalá no les moleste que cocine.

translation.en: Where I come from, we don't have chicken.
translation.es: En mi tierra no hay pollo.

translation.en: -Who the hell are you? -Oh, you know me, Lon.
You're the one that called me here.
translation.es: Tú eres el que me llamó.

translation.en: ...but with your every desire to get rid of the brat...
translation.es: ...sino con tus deseosde deshacerte del mocoso...

translation.en: ...all in the hopes that Mommy there might love you best.
translation.es: ...con la esperanza de que mamite quisiera más a ti.

translation.en: But you'll always be a seat-filler, Lon.
-You get out of here right now. -Lon.
It's the man from Jake's drawings.
translation.es: Es el hombrede los dibujos de Jake.

translation.en: Well, it looks like I've got myself a stalker.
This son of yours is quite special, isn't he?

translation.es: La culpa que debes de sentir...

translation.en: And you sent your only child off to the asylum.
translation.es: Y mandaste a tu único hijo al asilo.

translation.en: May you have twice that number.
I haven't seen one of your kind since I was a young man.
translation.es: No he visto uno de ustedesdesde que era joven.

translation.en: The boy here has visions of this place.
translation.es: El chico tiene visionesde este lugar.

translation.en: I need to know where it is.
PIMLI: We managed to do some serious damage, sir...
translation.es: Logramos dañarla mucho,pero no se derrumbó.

translation.en: -...but it didn't fall. WALTER: None of that matters.
translation.es: Logramos dañarla mucho,pero no se derrumbó. Nada de eso importa.Encontré al indicado.

translation.en: I found the one. This kid's going to bring down the Tower...
translation.es: Nada de eso importa.Encontré al indicado. Este niño va a destruir la Torresin la ayuda de nadie.
Este niño va a destruir la Torresin la ayuda de nadie.

translation.en: ...looking for an old friend of mine, Roland of Eld.
translation.es: ...buscando a un viejo amigo mío,Roland de los Eld.

translation.en: Wait, I thought all the Gunslingers were dead.
translation.es: Yo creía que todos los pistoleroshabían muerto.

translation.en: WALTER: Roland's always had an annoying ability...
translation.es: Roland siempre ha tenidoun talento molesto...

translation.en: So I killed everyone he ever cared about.
translation.es: He matado a todas las personasque ha querido.

translation.en: Last I heard, he was roaming the Mohaine aimlessly.
translation.es: Lo último que supe esque andaba en el Mohaine.

translation.en: -That's where the boy is going. -Mohaine Desert? Isn't that--?
translation.es: -Ahí va a ir el niño.-El desierto Mohaine, ¿no es...?

translation.en: Vast. Yes. And so is this boy's Shine.
translation.es: Extenso.Igual que el toque del niño.

translation.en: I'll send our trackers in the region, sir.
I don't have anything that can help with that.
translation.es: No tengo nada que te pueda ayudar.

translation.en: You need to rest, let it heal.
You've come all the way from Keystone Earth to find him.
translation.es: Viniste desde Tierra Piedra Angularpara buscarlo.

translation.en: His Shine is beyond anything I've ever seen.
translation.es: Su toque es superior a cualquieraque haya visto.

translation.en: Very few are born with this gift.
Often, the power is so slight, people don't even know they have it.
translation.es: A veces, el poder es tan leveque ni siquiera saben que lo tienen.

translation.en: ARRA [THINKING]: Your Shine burns so brightly, Jake.
You have potential I can't even begin to understand.
translation.es: Tienes un potencial que no puedoempezar a entender.

translation.en: Her voice was in my head.
translation.es: Oigo su voz en mi cabeza.

translation.en: It made you see across worlds.
translation.es: Te hizo ver a través de mundos.
En las Tierras Baldías del norte.

translation.en: That's more than six months of travel.
translation.es: Son más de seis meses de viaje.

translation.en: But you can get me there faster than that.
translation.es: Tú puedes hacerque llegue mucho antes.

translation.en: The Man in Black and his men keep track of all portal travel.
translation.es: El Hombre de Negro vigilatodos los viajes por portales.

translation.en: We couldn't help you, even if we wanted to.
The only way to access their territories is from one of their own bases.
translation.es: El único acceso a sus territorioses a través de sus bases.

translation.en: Then I'll make it on foot.
...they take kids from different worlds, right?
They tried to take me from New York.
translation.es: Trataron de agarrarme en Nueva York.

translation.en: -Doesn't that mean that they--? -They have a base there.
With a portal that can take me right to this place.
translation.es: Con un portal que me puede llevara este lugar.

translation.en: You're gonna send us to Keystone Earth.
translation.es: Vas a enviarnosa Tierra Piedra Angular.

translation.en: CANTAB: We're diverting power to the generators.
The portal will be ready shortly.
Do they have guns in your world?
And bullets, are they as rare as they are here?
You're gonna like Earth. A lot.
translation.es: Te va a gustar la Tierra... mucho.

translation.en: We agreed we'd never use the portal unless the village was in danger.
translation.es: Acordamos nunca usar el portala menos que el pueblo peligrara.

translation.en: They will find out we have it and come.
translation.es: Sabrán que lo tenemos y vendrán.

translation.en: We can't disobey a Gunslinger. It's the law.
translation.es: No podemos desobedecera un pistolero. Es la ley.

translation.en: -How do you know what he is? -Arra.
Last of the line of Eld.
But the Man in Black has his soul in his pocket...
translation.es: Pero el Hombre de Negrotiene su alma en su bolsillo...

translation.en: Or would you tell us differently?
Only a goat would lie to a seer.
translation.es: Solo una cabra le mentiríaa un vidente.

translation.en: The Gunslingers have sworn an oath to defend the Tower--
The war is over, and we lost.
translation.es: La guerra se acabó y perdimos.

translation.en: If you left your little haven, you would see that for yourself.
translation.es: Si dejaran su pequeño refugio,se darían cuenta.
La oscuridad está en todos lados.

translation.en: ...and trying to fight against it accomplishes nothing.
I was fighting to defend the Tower before most of you were even born.
translation.es: Yo estaba defendiendo la Torreantes de que ustedes nacieran.

translation.en: As long as the darkness is out there, the Tower will fall.
translation.es: Mientras la oscuridad siga allá fuera,la Torre caerá.

translation.en: And before that happens, I will get my revenge.
translation.es: Antes de que pase eso, me vengaré.

translation.en: And he doesn't even like me that much.
translation.es: Y ni siquiera le caigo bien.

translation.en: CANTAB: Should be ready anytime now.
As soon as it aligns, it should open...
...in an unobstructed area in your city...
translation.es: ...en una zona no obstruidade tu ciudad...

translation.en: Remember that number. It's your way back here.
translation.es: Recuerda ese número.Es tu manera de regresar.

translation.en: PIMLI: Sir, they're in the village.
-Can you fix it? -We have spare parts in the village.
translation.es: -¿Lo puedes arreglar?-Hay partes en el pueblo.

translation.en: Jake, go find somewhere close to hide, understand?
translation.es: Jake, escóndete en un lugar cercano.¿Entiendes?

translation.en: -We need to go! Hurry! -Are you okay?
His guns are forged from the steel...
translation.es: Sus pistolas se forjaron del acero...

translation.en: ...of the sword of Arthur Eld himself.
I believe Keystoners call it Excalibur.
-We have to get out of here. -No, I've got to get them out!
No, no, please, we have to go!
WOMAN: They were after our boy.
Why would they want our boy?
-Turn on the water pumps. MAN: Right away, sir.
WOMAN: No! MAN 1: Let's try to get them out!
And as long as he's here, you aren't either.
translation.es: Y mientras él esté aquí,ustedes tampoco.

translation.en: Be careful using the Shine. They're tracking you.
translation.es: Cuidado con el toque.Te están rastreando.

translation.en: We need to get you help. Right now.
One last time around the wheel, old friend.
translation.es: Una vez más alrededorde la rueda, mi viejo amigo.

translation.en: You can't walk into a hospital here carrying guns.
translation.es: No puedes entrar a un hospitalcon pistolas.

translation.en: Let me do all the talking.
LAURIE [ON RECORDING]: Hi. You've reached Laurie, Lon and Jake.
translation.es: Llama a la casade Laurie, Lon y Jake.

translation.en: ...and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
RACCOON 1 [ON TV]: This is awful. Try it.
-That looks gross. What is it? -You got to try it. It's terrible.
translation.es: -Parece asqueroso. ¿Qué es?-Tienes que probarlo. Es terrible.

translation.en: -I don't want to try it if it's terrible. -It's like mango....
translation.es: No quiero probarlo si es terrible.

translation.en: Do the animals here still speak?
Wait, what do you mean by "still"?
I see the antibiotics are kicking in.
On a scale of one to 10, how bad is your pain?
translation.es: En una escala del 1 al 10,¿qué tan fuerte es su dolor?

translation.en: You were in very bad shape.
I'm surprised you're even sitting up.

translation.es: Soy más duro que la mayoría.

translation.en: We get that sentiment a lot.
So aside from your infection and the wound from the...
translation.es: Además de su infección y la herida...

translation.en: ...we also found traces of hepatitis A, B, E, and...
translation.es: ...encontramos rastrosde hepatitis A, B, E y...

translation.en: Have you traveled overseas in the past couple of months?
translation.es: ¿Ha salido del paísel último par de meses?

translation.en: No. I've been here on Keystone Earth.
translation.es: No, he estado aquí,en Tierra Piedra Angular.

translation.en: So am I cured or not?
We're going to keep you here for the night to monitor your progress.
translation.es: Pasará aquí la noche para vigilarlo.

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow afternoon-- What are you doing? No.
-I can't stay here. DOCTOR: You need to get back on that.
But you need to get back on that.
JAKE: These are painkillers and vitamins.
You only want to take one or two at a...
translation.es: Debes tomar solo uno o dos...

translation.en: You have both forgotten the faces of your fathers.
translation.es: Las dos han olvidadolas caras de sus padres.

translation.en: You probably shouldn't talk to people here.
translation.es: No deberías hablar con la gente.

translation.en: How we gonna find the portal? New York's a pretty big place.
translation.es: ¿Cómo encontraremos el portal?Nueva York es grande.

translation.en: I just can't let Walter know how I'm coming for him.
translation.es: No puedo dejar que Waltersepa cómo voy a ir.

translation.en: I haven't felt this good in years.
translation.es: Hacía años que no me sentía tan bien.

translation.en: Yeah, we got the good stuff.
translation.es: Sí, nos dieron de los buenos.

translation.en: ROLAND: Got any more of that sugar?
ARRA: There's nothing to be scared of.

translation.es: Te juro que, pase lo que pase...

translation.en: -You'll be-- WALTER: A seer who lies.
Don't fight it. Where did he take the boy?
translation.es: No te resistas.¿A dónde se llevó al niño?

translation.en: You said they were crossing over kids.
translation.es: Dijo que pasaban niñosal otro lado.

translation.en: You were one of them, weren't you?
Which way did they take you through?
-No, no, you have to run. -Do you remember? A portal, a door.

translation.es: -Ya casi se acaba.-Lo que sea. Por favor.

translation.en: It's almost over. It's almost over.
Should have enough to find it. Got to get home and do some research.
translation.es: Tengo suficiente información.Debo ir a casa e investigar.

translation.en: -Your home? -Yeah, I got to let my mom know I'm okay.
translation.es: -¿A tu casa?-Mi mamá necesita ver que estoy bien.

translation.en: SAYRE: We have trackers spread throughout the city.
There's no trace of him yet, sir.
translation.es: Todavía no hay rastro de él.

translation.en: Couple of small spikes, but not enough to hone in on.
translation.es: Un par de picos, pero nada trazable.

translation.en: I left a surprise for our little friend. Just be ready.
translation.es: Le dejé una sorpresa al chico.Debes estar listo.

translation.en: -You should probably wait here. TIMMY: Dude.
-Where the hell have you been? JAKE: Timmy. Um....
How's Mom and Lon? They must be freaking out.
translation.es: ¿Cómo están mi mamá y Lon?¿Muy preocupados?

translation.en: They haven't been home since yesterday.
translation.es: No han estado en casa desde ayer.

translation.en: Close your mind. Let the pain run through you, Jake.
translation.es: Deja que el dolor te atraviese.

translation.en: My mom died so you could have your revenge?
translation.es: ¿Mi mamá muriópara que te pudieras vengar?

translation.en: Maybe your world is almost gone, but mine isn't.
translation.es: Quizá tu mundo esté moribundo,pero el mío no.

translation.en: You said it yourself, as long as the darkness is out there...
translation.es: Tú lo dijiste.Mientras exista la oscuridad...
Se llama el Cerdo de Dixie.
Está en el cruce de Plymouth y Pearl.

translation.en: It calms the heart and the mind.
translation.es: Calma el corazón y la mente.

translation.en: I haven't spoken it for years.
translation.es: No lo he dicho en años.

translation.en: I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que apunta con la manoha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que dispara con la manoha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: I do not kill with my gun.
BOTH [IN UNISON] He who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que mata con su pistolaha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: STEVEN: Not while the Tower still stands.
translation.es: No mientras la Torre siga de pie.
No mientras tú sigas de pie.

translation.en: -I kill with my heart. -I kill with my heart.
translation.es: -Yo mato con el corazón.-Yo mato con el corazón.

translation.en: Your Shine is your weapon, Jake.
translation.es: Tu toque es tu arma, Jake.

translation.en: Just do what he says. He won't hurt you.
translation.es: Haga lo que le dice.No lo va a lastimar.

translation.en: Well, then you're smarter than most.
All right, let's get you somewhere safe.
translation.es: Bien. Vamos a llevartea un lugar seguro.

translation.en: I see you finally found a compass, yet you still came to me.
translation.es: Veo que encontraste una brújula,pero aun así viniste conmigo.

translation.en: Because I'm your only destination, Roland.
translation.es: Porque yo soytu único destino, Roland.

translation.en: It's not me. I'm not doing this.
translation.es: ¡No soy yo!¡Yo no estoy haciendo esto!

translation.en: First, you want to save the Tower.
Then, kill the Man in Black.
translation.es: Luego querías mataral Hombre de Negro.

translation.en: You are like a dog fetching a stick over and over.
translation.es: Eres como un perroque busca un palo una y otra vez.

translation.en: You tell the kid what happened to the old crew?
translation.es: ¿Le dijiste al niño lo que le pasóa tu viejo equipo?

translation.en: You tell him that everyone that walks with you dies by my hand?
translation.es: ¿Le dijiste que yo mato a todoslos que caminan contigo?

translation.en: Your whimpering excuse for a dad.
translation.es: La vergüenza chillona de tu papá.

translation.en: Stop hiding behind your magic and face me, Walter!
translation.es: ¡No te escondas detrás de tu magiay aparécete, Walter!

translation.en: We both know that no matter who crosses the finish line first...
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que no importaquién llegue primero a la meta...

translation.en: You are the full package, as advertised.
translation.es: Eres el paquete completo,tal como me habían dicho.

translation.en: Tall, dark and handsome is about to crash the party.
translation.es: El alto y moreno llegaráa la fiesta sin invitación.

translation.en: MAN: Let's go, let's go! Move, move!
Alrighty. Let's go put everyone out of their misery, shall we?
translation.es: Muy bien. Acabemoscon el sufrimiento de todos.
Me están llevando a ese lugar.

translation.en: -It's really gonna happen, isn't it? -Oh, yes, it is.
translation.es: -De verdad va a suceder, ¿no?-Sí, sin duda alguna.

translation.en: Something's wrong here. The levels are plateauing.
translation.es: FRECUENCIA INTERRUMPIDA Algo está pasando.Los niveles se están estancando.

translation.en: Your visions didn't bring you to him, they brought you to me.
translation.es: Tus visiones no te llevaron a él,te trajeron a mí.

translation.en: He doesn't love you. He doesn't care for you.
translation.es: Él no te quiere, tú no le importas.

translation.en: In fact, he's been using you this entire time to get to me.
translation.es: De hecho, te ha estado usandopara acceder a mí.

translation.en: This is why you're here. This is your destiny.
translation.es: Viniste para esto.Este es tu destino.

translation.en: Yes, that's it. There we go.
Oh, my God. It's the kid.
translation.es: Ay, es el niño. FUENTE: LOCAL

translation.en: It's the kid! He's keeping the portal open!
translation.es: ¡Es el niño!¡Está manteniendo el portal abierto!

translation.en: So you wanted me to face you, old friend?
translation.es: Querías que me enfrentara a ti.

translation.en: It's fitting that you and the Tower should fall together.
translation.es: Es apropiado que túy la Torre caigan juntos.

translation.en: I do not aim with my hand.
He who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Aquel que apunta con la manoha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: JAKE: I do not shoot with my hand.
He who shoots with his hand--
translation.es: Aquel que dispara con la mano...

translation.en: Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Ha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: JAKE: I shoot with my mind.
JAKE: I do not kill with my gun.
He who kills with his gun--
translation.es: Aquel que mata con su pistola...

translation.en: JAKE: Has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: Ha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: --has forgotten the face of his father.
translation.es: ...ha olvidado la cara de su padre.

translation.en: REPORTER 1 [OVER RADIO]: Multiple witnesses saw... ...the strange phenomena in the sky.
translation.es: Muchos testigos vieronel extraño fenómeno en el cielo.

translation.en: REPORTER 2: Looks like we've seen the worst of it....
translation.es: Parece que ya pasó lo peor.

translation.en: REPORTER 3: The weather center has now issued a statement...
...that it may have been some kind of very intense solar flare.
JAKE: Here. ROLAND: What is this?
I have to leave here, Jake.
Why don't you come with me?
Besides, I could use your help.
translation.es: Además, me vendría bien tu ayuda.
